Kitchen stories

Competitors: Food & Recipe Creator Programs

Food & Recipe Creator Programs

From Katheryn Eckles

Key Insights

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Open vs. Curated Models: Whisk/Samsung Food, Recify, Instacart, and Amazon offer accessible entry for food creators that pass basic quality standards, while Mealime operates curated or professionally driven programs.



                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Monetization: Most platforms besides Mealime pay creators on either commission, per-view, hybrid, or revenue share; TikTok Shop, Instacart, and Amazon rely on affiliate/sales-driven payouts.



                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Content Moderation: All platforms combine automated tools and human oversight. Community flagging is common in open-access models.



                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Creator Requirements: Micro-influencers frequently participate, but higher visibility and payout opportunities scale with audience and engagement quality. Only TikTok Shop requires a specific follower minimum (1,000).

Samsung Food (former Whisk)

Program Structure

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * AI-powered platform for food and recipe discovery and personalization.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Over 160,000 recipes available; features custom meal planning, connected cooking (direct control of Samsung smart appliances), and social sharing.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Users and creators can save recipes, make shopping lists linked to SKUs, and get personalized recommendations.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Premium features: AI modification of recipes for dietary needs, vision AI (planned), Samsung Health syncing, and TV integration for recipe recognition from screen images.

Creator Requirements

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Not focused on creators but more focused on customers saving recipes from all over the internet; however,  they do have a creator program for those who upload recipes directly

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * No formal minimum follower count; creators must publish original, clear, brand-aligned recipes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Creators can share, follow, and engage socially within the app.

Monetization

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Creator Fund pays per recipe view and review; reported payout rates are $0.15/view and $0.50/review, with monthly minimums.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Additional affiliate commissions possible through shopping list integrations and partnered grocery retailers.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Premium options for advanced search and recipe customization via monthly subscription ($7/mo).

Content Moderation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Combination of automated and human moderation.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Editorial review for featured recipes and top contributors.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Community flagging, structured guidelines for recipe clarity, safety, and suitability.

Mealime

Program Structure

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Mobile app and web platform for recipe discovery, personalized meal plans, and grocery shopping list creation.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Users choose dietary preferences, input restrictions, get weekly meal recommendations, and automatically build shoppable lists.

Creator Requirements

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * No public/open application for creators; most recipes are curated by Mealime‚Äôs editorial staff, nutritionists, or selected partners.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * High emphasis on content quality, nutritional completeness, and alignment with health-conscious cooking.

Monetization

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * No direct monetization for recipe contributors.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Revenue arises from Mealime Pro subscriptions ($2.99/mo) for consumers, benefiting contributors via increased exposure, but not via direct payouts or affiliate commissions.

Content Moderation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Editorial vetting, nutritionist review, and strict standards for recipe accuracy before publication.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Ensures recipes are clear, correctly tagged, and aligned with healthy eating guidelines.

Recify

Program Structure

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Open food community platform for uploading, archiving, and organizing recipes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * AI-based system matches user recipes to ingredients and shopping options, with support for personal tagging and automated shopping list creation.

Creator Requirements

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Open to all content creators; no minimums, but highlighted/featured creators need engaging or original content.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * User submissions may be elevated by community engagement or editorial selection.

Monetization

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Affiliate partnerships for premium shopping links; otherwise, most value comes from free access and potential exposure.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * No structured direct payout model prominently documented.

Content Moderation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * AI-driven checks for spam, duplicates, and inappropriate content.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Community flagging and human moderation for high-visibility uploads or reports.

Instacart Tastemakers

Program Structure

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Food and grocery influencers create curated grocery lists and meal kits on Instacart‚Äôs app/website.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Followers can purchase entire ingredient bundles directly via the platform, reducing friction between inspiration and action.

Creator Requirements

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * No official minimum follower count; selected based on content quality, niche fit, and engagement.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Influence and authenticity prioritized over sheer audience size.

Monetization

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Affiliate commission per conversion (sale of curated grocery list), with bonus incentives for top-performing creators.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Transparent monthly reporting and payout via integrated platform dashboards.

Content Moderation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Platform review and periodic audits for authenticity of meal kits/lists and compliance with brand/customer standards.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * Some automated tools complemented by hands-on audits to ensure quality and compliance.

	Automated and community flagging for spam; human moderation for reviews and community organization. Editorial standards for recipe structure, clarity, and marketplace suitability

	Mealime

	Recipe aggregation and curation into customizable meal plans. Shopping lists can be exported for online grocery, or shopped through partners.

	No open signup for general public; curated creators and dietitian contributions prioritized. High content standards.

	No direct monetization; Mealime‚Äôs Pro app subscriptions ($2.99/mo) indirectly benefit recipe contributors via exposure; no affiliate payouts to creators.

	Editorial vetting, dietitian review, and nutrition checks for recipe accuracy and alignment with healthy eating and personalization goals.

	Recify

	Open platform to upload, archive, and organize recipes. AI matches recipes with ingredients and enables shopping options.

	Not specifically for influencers. Open to all; highlighted creators need original or highly engaging content.

	Some affiliate partnerships exist for premium integrations, but most value comes from free community access.

	Automated checks for inappropriate or duplicate content; human mod for highlighted uploads; community reporting.

	Amazon Influencer Program

	Influencers curate product/ingredient storefronts and earn when their audience shops using links.

	No hard follower minimums; quality and engagement evaluated.

	Commission per sale driven via affiliate links; rates vary by category.

	Strict enforcement of disclosure and product compliance. Quality review for platform participation, removal if guidelines not met.

	Instacart Tastemakers

	Influencers curate grocery lists/meal kits tied to Instacart‚Äôs platform; customers buy curated carts.

	No formal follower minimums; review for content fit, quality, and audience.

	Affiliate commissions per conversion (grocery list purchases), with bonus incentives for high performance.

	Platform review and periodic audit for content authenticity, list quality, and compliance.

	TikTok Shop (Food Niche)

	Creators host livestreams, upload/shop food products (including their own), and enable direct follower purchases.

	At least 1,000 followers required; engagement quality assessed.

	Revenue split per sale (platform/creator/brand); occasional bonuses and features for high performers.

	Mix of automated safety checks and human moderation; strict product compliance and clear disclosure required
